reviewText: I have been wanting this video for a long time. I was hoping for a DVD release but gave up on that. The concert is in my hometown of Kansas City, one of REO's strongholds. The fans are great, the energy and enthusiasm onstage are-as always- unmatched, and the off-stage footage is priceless. (I didn't know I would get to see Kevin, Gary and Bruce in their underwear. :) The best part, though, is getting to hear REO performing songs that they don't do in concert anymore. REO has been my favorite band for over 30 years, but I never got to see them live until 2007. This video gives me a chance to experience a little of what I missed all those years.
This is the only REO video concert I want to own, but I'm waiting for a DVD.

This video is so cool. Gee, I don't know how to describe it. It is just really cool. I just love watching all of those guys jam on stage. They are the best. I mean the best there is. Everyone who like Reo as much as me  should buy this video. It's the best.
this is REO in their prime.  the concert itself is beautifully shot, and the energy levels are at their peak.  if you are a reo fan, get this video.  by the way, the offstage footage is hilarious.
